```{r}
library(lme4)
load("count_data.RData")
```

# Trying to Model

```{r}
glm(data = count_data, polyp ~ water*time*temperature, family = poisson())
```

```{r}
library(rstatix)
```

```{r}
res.aov <- anova_test(
  data = count_data, dv = total, wid = beaker,
  between = c(water,temperature),
  within = c(time)
)
res.aov
```
